BR_text.BRsummary: vulnerable issue: password printed into stdout
BR_text.BRdescription:
When install k8s cluster, there would print the password a lot of times.
 For example:
 
 2018-06-14 03:33:46,820 [INFO] - k8sPaiLibrary.maintainlib.common : Executing the command on host [10.11.2.38]: sudo ./worker-deployment/docker-ce-install.sh
 password_here
 [sudo] password for user:

comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/fanyangCS>@fanyangCS</denchmark-link>
   Redirecting stdout to /dev/null will cause our command failure. Because this issue is not critical, pending it.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/pai/blob/master/deployment/k8sPaiLibrary/maintainlib/common.py#L335>https://github.com/Microsoft/pai/blob/master/deployment/k8sPaiLibrary/maintainlib/common.py#L335</denchmark-link>
